EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow - Singapore
EmailTemplate.textOnly: If you are concerned with the business end of your organisation, want to know why Platform as a Service (PaaS) is getting the ears of the board? Want to know how it can change the way you compete in the market via technology innovation? Attend to learn what PaaS can do and see what clever organisations are doing to outpace new market entrants and leapfrog existing ones. If you are interested in developing, deploying, and scaling applications for the Cloud Generation then stay for the workshop. Join the Pivotal engineering team for a hands-on workshop with Pivotal Cloud Foundry while you network with peers and build some new skills. Who Should Attend? Seminar This seminar is geared to those in R&D, operations, finance, innovation and IT concerned with applications, cloud and big data. The content is of value to anyone concerned with organizational risk. Workshop The keynote presentations set the stage for the workshop. This workshop is geared to application developers, enterprise architects, and anyone who wants to get hands-on experience developing an app in a PaaS environment. See the lab modules and topics [note need to link to detail on Developer and Architecture labs – lab 1 and lab 2] we'll cover. AGENDA 1:30 PM – 2:00 PM Registration & Coffee 2:00 PM – 2:30 PM Keynote: Software Kept Eating the World 2:30 PM – 3:00 PM Innovation: Who's Doing It Using PaaS? 3:00 PM – 3:20 PM Tea Break 3:20 PM – 4:30 AM Workshop - Lab 1 - The Developer Experience 4:30 PM – 6:00 PM Workshop - Lab 2 - Architecture and the Operator Experience 6:00 PM – 7:00 PM Happy Hour Register now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. THURSDAY November 6, 2014 IDA Lab @ National Design Center #03-04 111 Middle Road Singapore REGISTER KEYNOTE PRESENTER Lawrence Crowther, APJ Community Engineering Manager, has more than 14 years experience building and designing large enterprise systems across many different verticals. KEYNOTE PRESENTER Carlos Queiroz, Advance Field Engineer, works with Cloud computing and Fast data/Real Time technologies. www.pivotal.io Pivotal , committed to open source and open standards, is a leading provider of application and data infrastructure software, agile development services, and data science consulting. Pivotal's revolutionary Enterprise PaaS product, Pivotal CF, powered by Cloud Foundry, is available now.
